caption.center: ROBERT LEE LAWRENCE, APPELLANT, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, APPELLEE.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Bay County; N. Russell Bower, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Michael Allen, Public Defender, Terry P. Lewis, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Jim Smith, Atty. Gen., Lawrence Kaden, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
This case is before us pursuant to Anders v. California, 386 U.S. 738, 87 S.Ct. 1396, 18 L.Ed.2d 493 (1967). Having reviewed the record and considered the parties' briefs, we find no reversible error.
AFFIRMED.
BOOTH and BARFIELD, JJ., concur.
